title: What Does the Women’s Race at Unbound Mean for Other Gravel Race Organizers?
content:
"We're not sure yet," said Bobby Wintle of the Mid South. "I don't want to change the magic that is the start of our race, but I also want to give the women what they deserve."

Read the full article at What Does the Women’s Race at Unbound Mean for Other Gravel Race Organizers? on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
